rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
AI系统在青光眼、视网膜疾病的诊断、治疗方面可以媲美甚至超越眼科医生根据西奈山纽约眼耳医院的研究，大型语言模型 (LLM) 人工智能 (AI) 系统在青光眼和视网膜疾病患者的诊断和治疗方面可以与人类眼科医生相媲美，或者在某些情况下优于人类眼科医生。 （尼耶）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240223/AI-system-can-equal-or-surpass-otropics-in-diagnosis-treatment-of-glaucoma-and-retina-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240223/AI-system-can-equal-or-surpass-otropics-in-diagnosis-treatment-of-glaucoma-and-retina-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ef88f694-c805-4240-bbb5-c82320565b7a Fri, 23 Feb 2024 11:38:12 -0500 AI system can equal or surpass ophthalmologists in diagnosis, treatment of glaucoma and retina disorders
人工智能工具有助于开发最完整的细菌必需相互作用组图巴塞罗那自治大学 (UAB) 的研究人员制作了最完整的细菌必需相互作用图谱，即蛋白质如何结合和相互作用以执行其生存所必需的功能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240223/AI-tool-helps-develop-the-most-complete-map-of-the-bacterial-essential-interactome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240223/AI-tool-helps-develop-the-most-complete-map-of-the-bacterial-essential-interactome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=55c7692f-c0bb-4e82-a33e-27088e78ec94 Fri, 23 Feb 2024 11:31:57 -0500 AI tool helps develop the most complete map of the bacterial essential interactome
研究揭示细菌针对噬菌体病毒的动态防御组合南安普顿大学的科学家发现，细菌可以将它们的防御系统配对，产生比各部分之和还要强大的力量，来抵御噬菌体病毒的攻击。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240223/Research-reveals-bacterias-dynamic-defense-duo-against-phage-viruses.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240223/Research-reveals-bacterias-dynamic-defense-duo-against-phage-viruses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=507d0f76-5ded-435a-8cda-d9319dbc5310 Fri, 23 Feb 2024 11:22:07 -0500 Research reveals bacteria's dynamic defense duo against phage viruses
研究人员发现了与 2 型糖尿病相关的心血管疾病的潜在治疗方法Roy Blunt NextGen Precision Health 大楼的新研究发现了一种潜在的治疗方法，可以治疗 2 型糖尿病患者心血管疾病的根本原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240223/Researchers-identify-potential-treatment-for-cardioangio-disease-linked-to-Type-2-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240223/Researchers-identify-potential-treatment-for-cardioangio-disease-linked-to-Type-2-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cf916b87-55de-4c61-b076-a48f4cda6206 Fri, 23 Feb 2024 11:16:44 -0500 Researchers identify potential treatment for cardiovascular disease linked to Type 2 diabetes
研究显示，在 COVID-19 大流行期间，美国有超过 134,000 例癌症被漏诊根据肯塔基大学马基癌症中心的一项新研究，在 COVID-19 大流行的前 10 个月里，美国有超过 134,000 例癌症病例未被诊断。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240223/Study-reveals-over-134000-missed-cancer-diagnoses-in-the-US-during-COVID-19-pandemic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240223/Study-reveals-over-134000-missed-cancer-diagnoses-in-the-US-during-COVID-19-pandemic.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7b6e000f-bb46-4b14-bc36-3f8671bc1ccd Fri, 23 Feb 2024 09:23:58 -0500 Study reveals over 134,000 missed cancer diagnoses in the U.S. during COVID-19 pandemic
接种加强疫苗的母亲所生的新生儿具有较低的 COVID-19 风险和更好的结果芝加哥安和罗伯特 H. 卢里儿童医院 (Ann & Robert H. Lurie Children's Hospital of Chicago) 开展的一项关于怀孕期间 COVID-19 的国际研究发现，与未接种疫苗的母亲相比，接种加强疫苗的母亲的新生儿感染 COVID-19 的风险较低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240223/Neonates-of-booster-vaccinated-mothers-have-lower-COVID-19-risk-and-better-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240223/Neonates-of-booster-vaccinated-mothers-have-lower-COVID-19-risk-and-better-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0ccbd357-3dc3-42de-b593-1aa4dd5e2b75 Fri, 23 Feb 2024 08:45:18 -0500 Neonates of booster-vaccinated mothers have lower COVID-19 risk and better outcomes
发现抗生素抗性基因传播与耐药性进化之间的关键联系杜克大学的生物医学工程师发现了抗生素抗性基因的传播与某些病原体对新药的抗性进化之间的关键联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240223/Key-link-discovered- Between-spread-of-antibiotic-resistance-genes-and-drug-resistance-evolution.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240223/Key-link-discovered- Between-spread-of-antibiotic-resistance-genes-and-drug-resistance-evolution.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=221dc6ed-ea92-4d9b-b980-610b60639b79 Fri, 23 Feb 2024 07:58:47 -0500 Key link discovered between spread of antibiotic resistance genes and drug resistance evolution
自动胰岛素输送系统：进展和未来前景同行评审期刊《糖尿病技术与治疗》 (DTT) 的一份由 13 篇文章组成的特别增刊探讨了“自动胰岛素输送 (AID) 系统的发展和未来”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240223/Automated-insulin-delivery-systems-Advancements-and-future-prospects.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240223/Automated-insulin-delivery-systems-Advancements-and-future-prospects.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=90b6da15-ab7d-4fdf-99b1-5904192ba10b Fri, 23 Feb 2024 07:49:41 -0500 Automated insulin delivery systems: Advancements and future prospects
增加帕克洛维的使用可能会显着减少住院治疗并节省费用根据德克萨斯大学奥斯汀分校研究人员发布的一项新的流行病学模型，增加用于治疗 COVID-19 的抗病毒药物 Paxlovid 的使用，可以避免数十万人住院，并每年节省数百亿美元。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240223/Increased-paxlovid-use-could-lead-to-significant-hospitalization-reductions-and-cost- savings.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240223/Increased-paxlovid-use-could-lead-to-significant-hospitalization-reductions-and-cost- savings.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=61841683-37f8-4345-b844-0e54359916ca Fri, 23 Feb 2024 07:40:38 -0500 Increased paxlovid use could lead to significant hospitalization reductions and cost savings
中性粒细胞重编程促进某些癌症的肿瘤生长由 A*STAR.Singapore 免疫学网络 (A*STAR.SIgN) 领导的一项新研究发现，中性粒细胞——我们体内最丰富的白细胞之一——在某些癌症中发生巨大变化，采用一种新功能，它们促进肿瘤生长。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240223/Neutropil-reprogramming-promotes-tumor-growth-in-certain-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240223/Neutropil-reprogramming-promotes-tumor-growth-in-certain-cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3181a5ab-7c7e-4cfa-bc76-7d8c4db5a8ef Fri, 23 Feb 2024 07:34:30 -0500 Neutrophil reprogramming promotes tumor growth in certain cancers
